hooks.command:
# Run oxlint on changed JS/TS files (mirrors lefthook lint command)
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|ts|jsx|tsx)$ ]]; then
  output=$(bunx oxlint --fix "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1)
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Linting passed.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  else
    echo "{\"feedback\": \"Linting issues found:\n$output\"}" >&2
    exit 1
  fi
fi

# Run oxfmt on changed files (mirrors lefthook format command)
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|ts|jsx|tsx|json|css|md)$ ]]; then
  bunx oxfmt "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Formatting applied.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Formatting failed."}' >&2
    exit 1
  fi
fi
